title: dodging in promos
body: If I dodge in a promo with 1 win and 0 loses. Would it get marked down as 1 win 1 loss? Or would it take me out of the promo

replies.body: Queue dodging in a series will result in a loss.  Meaning, you would be placed at 1 win - 1 loss standing.  You would need to win your next game to move up a division!  More information on this is also available at our [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) guide.  I hope that helps clear things up, and good luck!

> [{quoted}](name=Commbustion,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KlViUL7U,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-17T04:08:35.702+0000)
>
> If I dodge in a promo with 1 win and 0 loses. Would it get marked down as 1 win 1 loss? Or would it take me out of the promo

1 win 1 loss
